name: Rocket Drill
description:
You pilot the last remaining RocketDrill to defend the city from alien invaders from the sky and below ground from a double invasion, will the city last? 
Controls:
A and D: rotate

W: move forward when underground

R: Restart

Esc: Quit Game

Team:
. Cole Pergerson  - Lead Designer/Programmer
. Nathan Le  - Programmer
. Miles Caraker - Audio/Music Composer
. Jackson Sides - Artist
